title: Zots Gets Clean
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 182 words, Level G (Grade 1), Lexile 350L, Fiction Series
description: Zots smells so bad! It's time to get clean! However, Zots and Abby have very different ideas about how to take a shower and brush their teeth. In Zots Gets Clean, students have the opportunity to read a funny story about the characters' ideas of what it means to be clean. The book can be used to teach students how to compare and contrast characters and how to identify and use quotation marks correctly.
meta: barf, brush, clean, nasty, shower, trash
Compare and Contrast : Compare and contrast information
Consonant Digraph Sounds : Discriminate consonant /sh/ sound
Quotation Marks : Recognize and use quotation marks
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency words how, my, with

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
